items.text: length, angling across, the batsman looks to run it down, gets beaten
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Paul, no run

items.text: length, wide outside off, steered straight towards point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Paul, no run

items.text: slower one on the pads, tucked away towards square leg
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Paul, 1 run

items.text: fuller outside off, a big stride forward to drive it towards sweeper cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chase, 1 run

items.text: length around off, pushed towards the bowler
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, no run

items.text: fuller on the stumps, pushes it towards long-on for a single
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, 1 run

items.text: tossed up, length around off, defended
items.postText: Al: "One of the keys to ODI batting these days is to pick a side that can maintain the same tempo regardless of circumstances. You've got to admire WI for that - no matter what has happened it has remained around 3-3.5 for the whole innings!!!"
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Paul, no run

items.text: short of length outside off, works it towards covers
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Paul, 1 run

items.text: flighted outside off, down the track and hits it towards long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, 1 run

items.text: short of length this time, some room available, goes back and cuts it towards sweeper cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Paul, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, drops it on the off side and sprints across for a single
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Paul, 1 run

items.preText: khan: "WI should target 180, though it will not be sufficient."
items.text: length ball, angling on the pads, misses the flick, an appeal for lbw but that's sliding down
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Chase, no run

items.text: short of length, on the stumps, pushed towards mid-on, the fielder is deep and they come back for the second
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Chase, 2 runs

items.text: length again, coming back in with the angle, mistimes it towards the right of long-on and that allows them to come back for the second once again
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Chase, 2 runs

items.text: slower one, length around off, Chase was early but adjusts in the end to defend it
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Chase, no run

items.text: fuller, a slower one just outside off, picks it up over deep midwicket, all wrists from Chase and it sails all the way for a six, the first of the innings
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Chase, SIX runs

items.text: flighted outside off, pushed gently towards point for a quick single
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Paul, 1 run

items.text: length ball, on middle and leg, flicked towards short fine leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, 1 run

items.text: down the track and driven all along the ground towards long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Paul, 1 run

items.text: use of feet by Chase as well, struck firmly but straight to long-off once more
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, 1 run

items.text: length on the stumps, punched off the back foot in the same region once more
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Paul, 1 run

items.text: length around off, spinning away from the batsman, a thick outside edge towards point
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, 1 run

items.preText: Rafi: "I think it's too early to write off WI. Clearly the pitch isn't conducive to stroke making. Too many balls have kept low. And most Bangladesh batsmen rely on timing in this format. So there is still a lot of cricket left in this match. As a Bangladesh fan, I wouldn't get carried away just yet. "
items.text: length ball, Chase misses the flick and gets an inside edge on to the pads, an appeal for lbw, not out
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chase, no run

items.text: short of length outside off, an offcutter, bouncing at the batsman, cut away towards third man
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chase, 1 run

items.text: back of length once again, dabbed towards short third man
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Paul, 1 run
